description: Shared MCP server configuration for UE MCP Extended - All AI tools should reference this

ports.30010: HTTP API - Remote Control API (MCP uses this)
ports.30020: WebSocket - Remote Control WebSocket (MCP connection status)

limited.description: Default mode - no UE settings changes required
limited.capabilities: Spawn, delete, select actors; move camera; save level; search assets

full.description: Enable Python + Console in UE Project Settings → Plugins → Remote Control API
full.capabilities: All Limited mode features + PIE control, viewmodes, build lighting, advanced queries
settings: Allow Console Command Remote Execution = True
